name: Bullet Escape
description:
Much better graphics on downloaded versions because Godot's HTML5 exporter sucks for what this specific project does (not bullet hell, the inverted circles).

Use mouse to navigate menus

Use WASD or arrow keys to move

Use shift to slow down

Use Esc to quit to the menu

Made in less than 3 days for Bullet Hell Jam 2022

I may add more before time is up
